text: Eghtɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itiba, mirakelɨn arazir kaba uaghan me bativam: me nan ziam duar kuraba batoghɨva, me nguibabar akar fozir puvatɨzibav kɨmɨva, egh kuruziba uan dafaribar dar suigham. Egh me imezir dɨpar ariaghɨritamar ameghtɨ a tong men navibagh asɨghasighan kogham. Egh me uan dafariba isɨ arɨmariar gumazibar arɨghtɨ men arɨmariaba gɨvam.”
